business.headline: Stock market closing: Top gainers and losers on Sensex, NiftyBenchmark indices snapped their seven-day winning streak, as investors turned cautious ahead of the monthly expiry. The S&P BSE Sensex dropped 728.69 points to close at 77,288.50, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 181.80 points, ending the session at 23,486.85.

India may lower duties on Harley-Davidson bikes, bourbon whiskey: SourcesIndia may further reduce import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles, US wines, and bourbon whiskey as part of ongoing India-US trade talks, according to sources.

Sensex tumbles over 700 points, Nifty settles below 23,500; IndusInd Bank up 3%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 728.69 points lower to 77,288.50,  while the NSE Nifty50 declined 181.80 points to settle at 23,486.85.

India may cut duties on Harley bikes, bourbon whiskey amid US talks: SourcesThe government had earlier reduced import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles from 50% to 40%. Similarly, import duty on Bourbon whisky was reduced from 150% to 100% in the past.

Insurance regulator flags concerns over Star Health's claim settlements: ReportAccording to IRDAI's handbook of insurance statistics, Star Health's incurred claim ratio stood at 66.47% for the financial year 2023-24. This ratio indicates the percentage of premium income that an insurance company pays out in claims.

IndusInd Bank raised $2 billion via market deposits in March: ReportThe country's fifth-largest private sector bank flagged earlier in the month a $175 million hole in its balance sheet, citing accounting discrepancies in its derivatives portfolio.

Sensex down 700 points: Why is stock market down despite FII buying, GDP growth?Stock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 755.50 points to 77,261.69, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 178.80 points to 23,489.85 as of 2:56 pm.

Why are Zomato, Swiggy shares falling today? Check key reasons, price targetsZomato, Swiggy stock price: Today's drop in Zomato and Swiggy's share price comes after a media report suggested that brokerage firm BofA Securities downgraded them.

India's GDP grows 105% in 10 years, now at $4.3 trillion: IMFIndia's economic growth in the past decade has outpaced several major global economies. While India's GDP increased by 105%, the US and China saw growth of 66% and 44%, respectively.

IndusInd Bank shares rise as lender seeks recruiters to hire top executivesIndusInd Bank stock price: The formal search process to fill the top managerial positions at IndusInd Bank is set to begin in April. Reacting to the report, shares of IndusInd Bank rose as much as 3% in early trade.

India on track to surpass Japan's GDP, could overtake Germany by 2027: IMFIndia's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) has more than doubled in the past decade, rising from $2.1 trillion in 2015 to an estimated $4.3 trillion in 2025.
Sensex, Nifty open flat as investors await clarity on US tariffs; Zomato drops 3%Sensex, Nifty open flat as investors await clarity on US tariffs; Zomato drops 3%

Top stocks to watch today: IREDA, BHEL, ONGC, HCLTech, IRFC, NCC and moreTop stocks to watch on March 26: Sensex and Nifty aim to extend gains as markets track global cues. Key stocks in focus include ONGC, Maruti, HCLTech, and NCC amid corporate developments and investment moves shaping today's session.

Sensex, Nifty opening predictions on March 26: What to expect today?Over the last seven sessions, the Nifty and Sensex have risen 5.7%, turning positive for the year so far. This rally has been supported by foreign capital inflows and expectations of stronger domestic economic growth.

BYD overtakes Tesla in 2024 revenue, becomes World's top EV makerBYD surpassed Tesla in revenue, reporting $107 billion in 2024. The Chinese EV giant leads China's auto market, while Tesla faces declining sales, boycotts, and a falling valuation amid industry challenges.

Wall Street drifts ahead of report on US consumer confidenceWall Street saw marginal gains on Tuesday after making gains a day earlier in hopes of the Trump administration potentially softening its next set of tariffs.
ATM cash withdrawals to get costlier from May 1. Here's whyThe Reserve Bank of India has approved a hike in ATM interchange fees, raising cash withdrawal costs for customers from May 1, 2025.

Government drops import duty on key parts for EV batteries, phonesFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said that the government will exempt import duty on 35 items used to make EV batteries and 28 items used in mobile phone manufacturing.

Sensex, Nifty erase gains to close flat amid tariff uncertainty; Zomato down 6%The S&P BSE Sensex closed just 32.81 points above at 78,017.19 after having gained nearly 700 points in the day. Nifty also followed a similar pattern as it ended with just a 10.30 point gain at 23,668.65.

Air India staff to fly economy as airline tackles passenger concerns: ReportThe move is part of Air India's effort to improve its service and customer experience, following criticism over frequent flight delays.

India open to tariff cuts on US imports worth $23 billion: ReportThe government is trying to reduce the impact of US President Donald Trump's global reciprocal tariffs, which are set to take effect from April 2.
What is Google tax that India is likely to scrap from April 1?The tax is expected to be scrapped from April 1, 2025, as part of amendments to the Finance Bill.

Sensex down over 700 points from day's high. Why stock market turned volatile?Stock market today: At around 11:45 am, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 51.05 points to 77,933.33 and the NSE Nifty50 declined 17.85 points to trade at 23,640.50.

India likely to remove 6% Google tax from April 1, tech giants to benefitThe Equalisation Levy know as 'Google Tax' was introduced in 2016 to tax payments made by Indian businesses to foreign companies for digital advertising services.

UltraTech Cement shares surge 4% in early trade today. Here's whyGlobal brokerage firm UBS has shared a fresh view on India's cement sector and upgraded stocks such as UltraTech Cement and Ambuja Cement.
Sensex jumps 700 points in early trade. 5 key things to know todayThe S&P BSE was up 739.51 points to 78,723.89 at 10.01 am, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 196 points to 23,854.35.

TCS, HCLTech, Infosys, Wipro: Why IT stocks are rising todayShares of IT major Infosys jumped over 2%, while Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) shares were trading over 1.5% higher on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). HCLTech shares were also up over 2% and Wipro shares rose over 1.3%.

Sensex, Nifty open in green as FIIs return on Dalal Street; IT stocks gainStock market opening on March 25: The S&P BSE Sensex gained over 350 points higher to open over 78,000, while the NSE Nifty50 gained nearly 100 points to trade above 23,750.

Sensex, Nifty set to extend rally: Key sectors to watch, strategies and risksStock market today: For those looking to invest, selective stock picking is key. With Nifty50 trading below its long-term valuation averages, investors may find value in largecap and midcap stocks.
Ola Electric shares to be in focus today. Here's whyIn an early morning exchange filing, Ola Electric Technologies announced that it has "amicably settled all outstanding dues" with Rosmerta Group.

Stocks to watch today: Ola Electric, Wipro, HCLTech, RVNL, Britannia and moreStocks to watch on March 25: With the stock market set to continue its positive run, here are the top stocks to watch out for during today's trading session.

Market opening predictions on March 25: What to expect from Sensex, Nifty todayForeign portfolio investors bought shares worth Rs 3,056 corer on Monday, marking their third consecutive day of buying. This trend has helped boost market confidence after a period of significant selling.

Samsung Electronics co-CEO Han Jong-hee dies of cardiac arrest at 63Samsung Electronics' co-CEO Han Jong-hee passed away at 63 due to cardiac arrest; he led the consumer electronics division and recently faced shareholder scrutiny over AI market struggles.

Wall Street gains ground after shaking off four-week losing streakThe New York Stock Exchange showed positive signs on Monday after weeks of decline ahead of a potentially softening stance on tariffs by the Trump administration.

Tesla shares jump 10% as investors eye possible tariff leeway, lower priceTesla shares surged 10% on Monday amid reports of tariff exclusions under the Trump administration. Investors saw an opportunity after a steep decline this year. The rally lifted Wall Street, with tech stocks pushing indexes to two-week highs.

180 Boeing employees laid off in India under global workforce reduction: ReportAs part of the global workforce reduction, up to 180 staff at the Boeing India Engineering Technology Center in Bengaluru were laid off in the December quarter of 2024.
Sensex reclaims 78,000 after 1,100-point rally, Nifty ends above 23,600The S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,078.87 points to close at 77,984.38, while the NSE Nifty50 added 323.55 points to end at 23,673.95.

US planning to scale back April 2 reciprocal tariffs for specific sectors: ReportsUS President Donald Trump's administration may exclude a set of sector-specific tariffs while applying reciprocal levies on April 2, Bloomberg News and the Wall Street Journal reported, citing officials.

A rat did it: Japanese stock tanks after unexpected rodent incidentThe stock of the Japanese firm Zensho Holdings Co fell 7.1% in one of its biggest declines since February 13 due to an incident involving a rodent.

How Zerodha's Nithin Kamath left a lasting impression on a customerNithin Kamath not only acknowledged the customer's concern but also took immediate action. Zerodha's team quickly looked into the compliance issue and assured the customer that they were working on resolving it.

entertainment.headline: Actor Rajendra Prasad apologises to David Warner after backlash: He's like my sonTelugu actor Rajendra Prasad apologised to David Warner after his comments sparked backlash online. This came after the actor playfully mocked the cricketer for recreating Pushpa steps.

Watch Adolescence actor Owen Cooper's star-making auditionAdolescence star Owen Cooper has become a household name after his hit-making turn in the Netflix series. The British actor's audition for the series was shared by director Philip Barantini on social media.

Chainsaw Man The Movie Reze Arc: Check out release date, story and other detailsThe Chainsaw Man movie focusing on the Reze Arc is set to release in Japan on September 19, but release dates for the US and India remain unconfirmed. Read more details about the film here.

Netflix's Adolescence becomes most-watched limited series in two weeksThe British drama Adolescence has taken Netflix by storm, setting a new record for the most-watched limited series within two weeks.

K-drama star Kim Soo-hyun's Taiwan fan meet postponed amid Kim Sae-ron rowK-drama star Kim Soo-hyun's fan meet in Taiwan has been postponed amid the ongoing Kim Sae-ron row. Soo-hyun faced backlash for his relationship with Sae-ron. They reportedly began dating when Sae-ron was a minor.

Virat Kohli makes TV debut? Turkish actor's resemblance to cricketer surprises fansTurkish actor Cavit Cetin Guner's uncanny resemblance to cricketer Virat Kohli has surprised fans. A picture of the actor from the series has emerged online, with several fans reacting to the same.

Mammootty wishes Empuraan team, says 'rooting for you, dear Lal and Prithvi'Veteran actor Mammootty has shown his support for L2: Empuraan, the sequel to the hit film Lucifer. As the movie gears up for its release, Mammootty wishes the team a historic success.

Santosh, UK's official Oscars entry, blocked for release in IndiaThe Central Board of Film Certification has blocked the release of the film Santosh in India, which was the UK's official entry to the Oscars and deals with sensitive societal issues. Actor Shahana Goswami, who plays the titular role, spoke to India Today Digital about it.

Nani's ripped look in The Paradise's poster sparks buzz, film eyes 2026 releaseThe makers of Nani and Srikanth Odela's highly anticipated period action drama, The Paradise, have unveiled a new poster, marking the one-year countdown to its release on March 26, 2026.

Ajey: The Untold Story of a Yogi brings Yogi Adityanath's life to the screenAjey: The Untold Story of a Yogi, based on Yogi Adityanath's life, was announced on Wednesday. Starring Anant Joshi, the film releases in 2025 in five languages. Directed by Ravindra Gautam, it is produced by Samrat Cinematics.

Thalapathy Vijay's Jana Nayagan, Jr NTR's Dragon await a big clash in 2026The makers of Thalapathy Vijay's Jana Nayagan have announced the release date, confirming a grand Pongal/Makar Sankranti premiere on January 9, 2026. However, the film is set to clash with Jr NTR and Prashanth Neel's much-anticipated action entertainer, reportedly titled Dragon.

Critics' Choice Awards: Diljit Dosanjh wins Best Actor, All We Imagine as Light shinesDiljit Dosanjh, All We Imagine as Light among others, won big at the Critics' Choice Awards 2025. Take a look at the winner list here.

Internet calls Benny Blanco greenest flag after viral video with Selena GomezProducer Benny Blanco is being praised as a 'green flag' after displaying emotional intelligence in a now viral interview which also features his partner and singer Selena Gomez.

Allu Arjun, Trivikram's mythological film is not Ramayana or Mahabharata: ProducerAllu Arjun and Trivikram Srinivas are collaborating for a big-budget mythological film. Producer Naga Vamsi said that the film is neither based on Mahabharata nor Ramayana.

Archana Puran Singh's son Aaryamann: Not landed roles despite 100 auditionsArchana Puran Singh's YouTube vlogs featuring her family are becoming popular as they share personal moments. In a recent vlog, Singh's son Aaryamann humourously claimed that he was rejected from 100 auditions because of reverse nepotism.

Prithviraj on box office clash with Salman: Watch 'Sikandar' at 11, 'Empuraan' at 1Actor Prithviraj Sukumaran broke his silence on the box office clash of his film 'L2: Empuraan' with Salman Khan's 'Sikandar'. He appreciated Khan's larger-than-life screen presence and shared that the audience has to watch both the films.

Prithviraj Sukumaran on directing Mohanlal: He opened my eyesPrithviraj Sukumaran said working with Mohanlal on L2: Empuraan changed his perspective on acting. He learnt to align with a director's vision and unlearned habits after turning director himself.

Ben Affleck reveals why playing Batman was an excruciating experienceActor-director Ben Affleck didn't have a good time playing the iconic character of Batman. The artiste shared his experience about the same in a recent interview.

Sikandar advance booking Day 1: Salman Khan's film starts pre-sales on slow noteSalman Khan's 'Sikandar' opened its advance booking on Tuesday. The pre-sales business has begun on a slow note for now, but it is expected to pick up by Friday-Saturday.

general news.headline: India calls US religious freedom panel 'entity of concern', rejects its reportThe Ministry of External Affairs rejected USCIRF's 2025 report that suggested minorities were facing deteriorating treatment in India. The US panel also recommended sanctions against RAW.

Stop being a stooge: Kunal Kamra claims his video got T-Series copyrightComedian Kunal Kamra has hit back at music company T-Series after it allegedly blocked the visibility of his stand-up special on YouTube, citing copyright issues.

Unboxing Saugat-e-Modi Eid kits: Why BJP is giving gifts to MuslimsThe BJP is distributing Saugat-e-Modi kits to help 32 lakh poor Muslims celebrate Eid. Is it plain outreach by the BJP after bitter election campaigns and opposition over the Waqf Bill, or is it timed with the Bihar polls? Most importantly, why is it called Saugat-e-Modi, and not Saugat-e-BJP? Unboxing the BJP's kit here.

Feel like living in Pak: Punjab MLA slams own government over health facilitiesAAP MLA Devinderjeet Singh Dhose's outburst came during the Budget session in the Assembly after the Health Minister announced no new project for Moga.

Why a slow morning is the best way to start your dayA slow morning is about starting the day at a relaxed pace, without the stress of rushing. It involves taking time to wake up, enjoying a mindful routine, and easing into the day with calmness.

Rahul Gandhi says he wasn't allowed to speak in Lok Sabha, BJP calls him 'puerile'Rahul Gandhi has on several occasions alleged that his microphone was switched off in the Lok Sabha when he attempted to raise pressing issues.

India may cut duties on Harley bikes, bourbon whiskey amid US talks: SourcesThe government had earlier reduced import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles from 50% to 40%. Similarly, import duty on Bourbon whisky was reduced from 150% to 100% in the past.

Eknath Shinde's 'gaddar' clapback at Opposition amid Kunal Kamra rowMaharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde attacked the Opposition amid a row over comedian Kunal Kamra's 'gaddar' jibe at the Shiv Sena leader, saying the people had decided who is a 'gaddar' (traitor) and a 'khuddar' (self-respecting).

Life on a boat: Indian family 'sells nearly everything' to sail full-time. Watch videosCapt. Gaurav Gautam (Retd.) and his wife Vaidehi decided to quit their well-paying jobs in 2022, homeschool their teenage daughter Kaeya, and shift base to their 42-foot sailboat, Reeva.

Three days in Indian courts: A tale of 'corruption', misogyny and privilegeAn allegedly cash-hoarding judge, a ruling trivialising sexual assault and selective leniency for the privileged underline the dire need for transparency and accountability reforms

Auroras seen on Neptune for the first time by James Webb TelescopeThe detection of these auroras provides new insights into how Neptune's magnetic field interacts with solar particles and enhances our understanding of ice giant atmospheric science.

BJP expels Karnataka MLA for 6 years over remarks against party, BS YediyurappaBJP MLA from Karnataka's Bijapur City, Basanagouda Patil Yatnal, was expelled from the party for six years, effective immediately. The party's disciplinary committee issued the order over his comments against the party and former Chief Minister BS Yediyurappa.

Critics' Choice Awards: Diljit Dosanjh wins Best Actor, All We Imagine as Light shinesDiljit Dosanjh, All We Imagine as Light among others, won big at the Critics' Choice Awards 2025. Take a look at the winner list here.

Kunal Kamra doubles down with new satire video, takes dig at Nirmala SitharamanThe video, a parody of the hit song 'Hawa Hawai', was released by Kunal Kamra as Mumbai police issued him a second summons over his 'traitor' jibe at Eknath Shinde.

Video: Astronaut blends science and sports with solo baseball in spaceThe video has garnered attention, even being shared by tech entrepreneur Elon Musk, who praised Wakata's playful demonstration of space sportsmanship.

Video: Iran unveils underground 'Missile City' as US nuclear deal deadline loomsThe unveiling marked Iran's latest defiance of US pressure, showcasing advanced missile stockpiles while exposing structural vulnerabilities that could prove disastrous if hit by American or Israeli strikes.
How to raise children to be gender sensitiveTo make our young learners healthy, informed and empowered, the curriculum must talk about comprehensive sexuality education

With eye on 'not Udta Punjab', AAP allocates Rs 150 crore for drug censusThe AAP government in Punjab allocated Rs 150 crore to hold a drug census to collect data from every household to understand the prevalence of drugs, usage of de-addiction centres and on the socio-economic status of the people.

Insensitive, inhuman: Supreme Court pauses 'grabbing breasts not rape' orderThe Supreme Court, which took suo motu cognisance of the controversial order by the Allahabad High Court, said the judgment showed lack of sensitivity.

Sensex tumbles over 700 points, Nifty settles below 23,500; IndusInd Bank up 3%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 728.69 points lower to 77,288.50,  while the NSE Nifty50 declined 181.80 points to settle at 23,486.85.

'Apologise to Muslims': Row over actor Mohanlal's Sabarimala pooja for MammoottyActor Mohanlal performed a special puja for Mammootty at Sabarimala on March 18. This sparked controversy regarding the Hindu-Muslim faith to which Mohanlal responded at a Chennai event.

Who is Jay Bhattacharya, Indian-origin professor to head US health agencyIndian-origin Stanford professor Jay Bhattacharya has been confirmed as the Director of the National Institutes of Health by the US Senate with a 53-47 vote.

Why BJP needs a limping Nitish Kumar as crutch in BiharAs Bihar inches towards the Assembly election in 2025, the health and behaviour of Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar of the Janata Dal (United), a key NDA ally, has become a concern for ally BJP. But the BJP is aware of the pros and cons of Nitish as the CM face. This is what the BJP stands to gain and lose by sticking with Nitish.

sports.headline: NZ vs PAK: After T20I series loss, Salman Agha expects ODIs to be 'different'Pakistan T20I captain Salman Ali Agha expects the ODI series against New Zealand to be a different one. Pakistan lost the T20I series 1-4 against New Zealand.

IPL 2025 Rajasthan Royals vs Kolkata Knight Riders: Ball by Ball commentaryIPL 2025 Rajasthan Royals vs Kolkata Knight Riders: Ball by Ball commentary: Rajasthan and Kolkata are all set to lock horns in an exciting clash in the IPL 2025.

NBA: We just can't risk it, says Steve Kerr as Warriors struggle without Stephen CurryThe Golden State Warriors suffered a defeat yet again against the Miami Heat in a thrilling 112-86 on Tuesday, March 25, as the Warriors are barely holding onto the sixth spot in the Western Conference.

RR vs KKR Live: Rajasthan, Kolkata eye first win in GuwahatiRajasthan Royals (RR) vs Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) Live Score, IPL 2025: After facing defeats in their opening matches, Rajasthan Royals and Kolkata Knight Riders will lock horns in Guwahati, RR's second home this season. Captains, Riyan Parag and Ajinkya Rahane, will have a lot to prove in the game as both teams aim to get their season up and running.

GT vs PBKS: Viral video shows how Arshdeep masterminded Vyshak Impact SubArshdeep Singh's tactical brilliance helped Punjab Kings seal a thrilling win over Gujarat Titans, as his timely suggestion led to Impact Sub Vyshak Vijaykumar's match-winning performance in the death overs. Punjab's bowling strategy proved decisive in stalling Gujarat's chase.

Manolo rues injury-hit India's "very, very poor" draw vs BangladeshManolo Marquez blasted India's "very, very poor" display against Bangladesh, admitting his side was lucky to escape with a draw. With midfield creativity lacking, India's predictable attacking patterns continue to limit their goal-scoring potential.

Brazil captain Marquinhos issues apology to fans after Argentina thrashingBrazil captain Marquinhos has apologised to the fans after they were humbled by Argentina in the World Cup Qualifier on Tuesday, March 25. Argentina beat Brazil 4-1 in the match, piling on more misery on the Selecao.

Virat Kohli proves doubters wrong, adjusts his game to team's needs: Sanjay BangarFormer India cricketer turned commentator Sanjay Bangar praised Virat Kohli for his match-winning half-century against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) in the opening game of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Kohli has been a mentor to the cricket community: PBKS star StoinisVirat Kohli's dedication and fitness set the benchmark for cricketers, as Marcus Stoinis praises the Indian star for inspiring players worldwide with his unwavering commitment and passion for the game.

Stronger and tougher, Palak Kohli focussing on baby steps towards Paralympics dreamsExclusive: In a chat with India Today Digital, India's para-badminton star Palak Kohli spoke about how she recovered from a career-threatening bone tumour to transform into a stronger character. She also talked about her goals for the Los Angeles Paralympics, having also taken part in two editions of the quadrennial event.

NZ vs PAK: Neesham's 5-for, Seifert's blitz crush Pakistan by 8 wickets in 5th T20INew Zealand beat Pakistan by eight wickets in the fifth and final T20I to seal the series 4-1. James Neesham was awarded Player of the Match for his five-wicket haul.

If she says it's fine, then it's amazing: Djokovic gets the nod from SerenaMiami Open 2025: Novak Djokovic said that she was surprised to see Serena Williams watching him from the stands during the pre-quarterfinal against Lorenzo Musetti on Tuesday.

WPL 2026 to have more teams? Arun Dhumal opens up on BCCI's plansWPL committee member Arun Dhumal, who's also the IPL chairman, said that the BCCI doesn't have any immediate plans to increase the number of teams.

IPL 2025: Rashid Khan breaks Jasprit Bumrah's record vs Punjab KingsGujarat Titans (GT) wrist spinner Rashid Khan broke Jasprit Bumrah's record as he completed 150 wickets in Indian Premier League (IPL) during Match 5 of IPL 2025 against Punjab Kings (PBKS).

Messi, Argentina to visit India in October for exhibition matchFootball fans in India will get another chance to see Lionel Messi and his Argentine teammates in action during an exhibition match in Kerala this October, 14 years after Messi first visited the country as a player.

Pakistan's Hasan Nawaz sets embarrassing T20I record with 3 ducksNZ vs PAK: Pakistan batter Hasan Nawaz bagged his third duck in the T20I series when Jacob Duffy dismissed him on Wednesday at the Westpac Stadium in Wellington.

Rajasthan will take on Kolkata Knight Riders on March 27.

Shreyas Iyer is the best Indian batter for attacking spinners: Aakash ChopraFormer India cricketer turned commentator Aakash Chopra has said that Punjab Kings (PBKS) captain Shubman Gill is the best Indian batter against spinners. Iyer scored a breathtaking 97* (42) against Gujarat Titans.

Should've looked for boundaries instead of just sixes against Vyshak: Sai KishoreGujarat Titans all-rounder R Sai Kishore feels that their team should've looked to hit more boundaries instead of just sixes against Vijaykumar Vyshak. Gujarat lost their opening game against Punjab Kings by 11 runs.

Early impressions: PBKS out for blood with army of all-RoundersIPL 2025: Punjab Kings started their campaign in style with a powerful show with the bat against Gujarat Titans on Tuesday, March 25. Ponting's side showed promise; could they be one of the front-runners to reach the playoff spots?

Falling short by only 11 runs is a positive, but GT should have won: Sai KishoreIPL 2025, GT vs PBKS: In the post-match press conference, Sai Kishore said that the Gujarat Titans should have won their match against Punjab Kings in Ahmedabad on Tuesday given the position they got themselves in during the run-chase.

RR vs KKR Playing XI Prediction, IPL 2025: Will Rajasthan alter their bowling attack?RR vs KKR Playing 11, Rajasthan Royals vs Kolkata Knight Riders Prediction: Rajasthan and Kolkata will lock horns in Match 6 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) in Guwahati. Both teams will be eager to register a win after losing their respective last fixtures.

Rattled Knight Riders, Royals seek redemption in Riyan Parag's denIPL 2025, Rajasthan Royals vs Kolkata Knight Riders Match Preview: Riyan Parag's RR and Ajinkya Rahane's KKR will be looking to get on the board after heavy defeats to SRH and RCB respectively.

'Improved' Shreyas Iyer ready to play all formats: Sourav GangulyIPL 2025: Former Indian captain Sourav Ganguly said that Shreyas Iyer has upped his game enough in the last 12 months to be able to play all three formats for the Indian team.

Priyansh Arya is fearless, and is technically very correct: Shashank SinghIPL 2025: Shashank Singh praised Priyansh Arya for being fearless and having solid technique after he scored 47 runs off 23 balls for the Punjab Kings in their match against Gujarat Titans at the Narendra Modi Stadium.

Shreyas Iyer one of the best captains, used Vyshak at the right time: ShashankIPL 2025: Shashank Singh praised Vijaykumar Vyshak and Shreyas Iyer after the Punjab Kings got off to a splendid start with an 11-run win over Gujarat Titans at the Narendra Modi Stadium.

D Gukesh draws from MS Dhoni: Chess, pressure, and the art of staying coolWorld chess champion D Gukesh reflected on how MS Dhoni has influenced his approach to handling pressure. Speaking to Chennai Super Kings from Chepauk, the 18-year-old Grandmaster shared insights on the art of staying composed.

Fan rants about quality of Hindi commentary, Harbhajan Singh respondsIPL 2025: Former spinner Harbhajan Singh took a feedback positively after a fan commented on the deteriorating quality of Hindi commentary during the tournament.

Rayudu's Bombay quip goes viral after Shreyas Iyer's selfless 97Shreyas Iyer's selfless 97-run knock and bold leadership helped Punjab Kings secure an 11-run victory over Gujarat Titans, marking a strong start to their IPL 2025 campaign under Ricky Ponting's guidance.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
